name: Butter Thief | The thief with the butter
name_original: Butter Thief | The thief with the butter
description:
Steal valuable objects around a fancy Penthouse located on top of the highest skyscraper!

Avoid guards patrolling the entire place by either knocking them out, sneaking around or taking different routes around the house.

Start your criminal career with a bang and finish this high-risk heist!

MEET THE CHARACTERS

  • Main Character | Born with superhuman capabilities to sweat pure butter from his pores, he's able to slip away from any tense situation and slide with ease. This can be a detriment however, if he sweats too much, he'll be incapable of moving.
  • Lamp Dude | Not much is known about the lamp dude, but he put the team together. He's got the connections and skill to pull this heist off. He also has the ability to turn into a lamp though he refuses to talk more about it.
  • Guards | Typical muscle for hire, not really more to it. They're dumb as rocks but have a mean grab. They're also speedy if they spot you!

CONTROLS

Moving | W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys

Space Bar | Interact with items

Return To Menu | ESC

Restart Level | R
